No anti-leech or w/e. If you're going to check this out/downloading/using please leave a [B][COLOR="#FF0000"]THANK![/COLOR][/B]

Just for all the people who like the [COLOR="#FFD700"]2007[/COLOR] style pking, login and pk :) I'll promise you guys you won't regret it, just give it a try!
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/28t9y0w.png[/img]Download link:[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/s/3lm4yylz4qcplqz/client.jar]Download Ardeche PK Client[/url] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/1498569.png[/img]Forums: [url=http://ardechepk.webs.com/apps/forums/]Ardeche PK Forums - Index[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]Webclient: [url=http://ardechepk.webs.com/]Ardeche PK Webclient[/url]
[COLOR="#FFD700"]Features: [/COLOR]Perfect Switching All skills work smoothly clan chat 2007 style 474 data/items/animations ( Nothing above that!) Item Spawning Modern/Ancient/Lunar magic Alot of easy command (master/melee/hybrid/tank etc)
